findings.title: Broad IP assignment / ownership transfer language
findings.rationale: Assignment language may transfer ownership of work product or IP rather than granting a limited license.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...6. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be assigned to the Disclosing Party. The Receiving Party hereby assigns all right, title, and interest in such work product....
findings.exact_snippet: hereby assigns all right, title, and interest
findings.context:
under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

6. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be assigned to the Disclosing Party. The Receiving Party hereby assigns all right, title, and interest in such work product.

7. ATTORNEYS' FEES
Each party shall bear its own attorneys' fees.

8. RENEWAL
This Agreement may be renewed by mutual written consent.

9. AUDIT RIGHTS
No audit rights a

findings.title: Specific governing law or venue
findings.rationale: Governing law and venue choices can affect enforcement cost and strategy.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...11. GOVERNING LAW This Agreement is governed by applicable law....
findings.context:
es.

8. RENEWAL
This Agreement may be renewed by mutual written consent.

9. AUDIT RIGHTS
No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

10. LATE FEES
No late fees apply.

11. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement is governed by applicable law.

12. DEFINITIONS
Confidential Information means information marked as confidential.

This Agreement is executed on 2024-01-01.

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
Implemented clause-level anchoring and false-positive suppression
